examples.alt: AI generated Qwen Image - Miyazaki anime style street scene with Chinese text
examples.prompt: Miyazaki anime style. Eye-level shot of a bustling ancient street under sunlight. A disciple in green robes stands in the center, holding a card with 'Alibaba Cloud' written on it. Two children look at him in surprise. On the left is a shop with a 'Cloud Storage' sign, displaying glowing server cases with two guards at the entrance. On the right are two shops: one with a 'Cloud Computing' sign where a beautiful woman in qipao looks at glowing computer screens, and another with a 'Cloud Model' sign featuring a large wine jar labeled 'Qwen' with a shopkeeper pouring glowing code solution into it.

examples.alt: AI generated Qwen Image - Traditional Chinese room with calligraphy couplets
examples.prompt: An elegant and dignified couplet hanging in a hall, with a quiet classical Chinese-style room setup. Blue and white porcelain is placed on the table. The couplet reads on the left 'Righteousness born from knowledge, humans and machines share the path of good thinking and innovation', on the right 'Connecting clouds to wisdom, heaven and earth inspire numbers with high aspirations', with the horizontal inscription 'Wisdom Enlightens Tongyi'. The calligraphy is flowing and elegant, with a Chinese-style painting of Yueyang Tower hanging in the center.

examples.alt: AI generated Qwen Image - Bookstore window display with English text
examples.prompt: Bookstore window display. A sign displays "New Arrivals This Week". Below, a shelf tag with the text "Best-Selling Novels Here". To the side, a colorful poster advertises "Author Meet And Greet on Saturday" with a central portrait of the author. There are four books on the bookshelf, namely "The light between worlds" "When stars are scattered" "The silent patient" "The night circus"

examples.alt: AI generated Qwen Image - Infographic slide about emotional wellbeing habits
examples.prompt: A slide featuring artistic, decorative shapes framing neatly arranged textual information styled as an elegant infographic. At the very center, the title "Habits for Emotional Wellbeing" appears clearly, surrounded by a symmetrical floral pattern. On the left upper section, "Practice Mindfulness" appears next to a minimalist lotus flower icon, with the short sentence, "Be present, observe without judging, accept without resisting". Next, moving downward, "Cultivate Gratitude" is written near an open hand illustration, along with the line, "Appreciate simple joys and acknowledge positivity daily". Further down, towards bottom-left, "Stay Connected" accompanied by a minimalistic chat bubble icon reads "Build and maintain meaningful relationships to sustain emotional energy". At bottom right corner, "Prioritize Sleep" is depicted next to a crescent moon illustration, accompanied by the text "Quality sleep benefits both body and mind". Moving upward along the right side, "Regular Physical Activity" is near a jogging runner icon, stating: "Exercise boosts mood and relieves anxiety". Finally, at the top right side, appears "Continuous Learning" paired with a book icon, stating "Engage in new skill and knowledge for growth". The slide layout beautifully balances clarity and artistry, guiding the viewers naturally along each text segment.

examples.alt: AI generated Qwen Image - Movie poster with detailed text layout
examples.prompt: A movie poster. The first row is the movie title, which reads "Imagination Unleashed". The second row is the movie subtitle, which reads "Enter a world beyond your imagination". The third row reads "Cast: Qwen-Image". The fourth row reads "Director: The Collective Imagination of Humanity". The central visual features a sleek, futuristic computer from which radiant colors, whimsical creatures, and dynamic, swirling patterns explosively emerge, filling the composition with energy, motion, and surreal creativity. The background transitions from dark, cosmic tones into a luminous, dreamlike expanse, evoking a digital fantasy realm. At the bottom edge, the text "Launching in the Cloud, August 2025" appears in bold, modern sans-serif font with a glowing, slightly transparent effect, evoking a high-tech, cinematic aesthetic. The overall style blends sci-fi surrealism with graphic design flairâ€”sharp contrasts, vivid color grading, and layered visual depthâ€”reminiscent of visionary concept art and digital matte painting, 32K resolution, ultra-detailed.

examples.alt: AI generated Qwen Image - Man with handwritten poetry on paper
examples.prompt: A man in a suit is standing in front of the window, looking at the bright moon outside the window. The man is holding a yellowed paper with handwritten words on it: "A lantern moon climbs through the silver night, Unfurling quiet dreams across the sky, Each star a whispered promise wrapped in light, That dawn will bloom, though darkness wanders by." There is a cute cat on the windowsill.

examples.alt: AI generated Qwen Image - Artistic styles showcase from photorealistic to anime
examples.prompt: A collection showcasing various artistic styles generated by Qwen Image, ranging from photorealistic scenes to impressionist paintings, anime-style illustrations, and minimalist designs. Each example demonstrates the model's versatility in responding to different creative prompts and artistic directions.

examples.alt: AI generated Qwen Image - Image editing capabilities demonstration
examples.prompt: A demonstration of Qwen Image's editing capabilities including style transfer, object addition and removal, detail enhancement, text editing, and character pose adjustments. The examples show before and after comparisons highlighting the model's precision in image modification tasks.

placeholderText: Describe your ideal image with details like objects, style, text layout, and mood to generate a unique visual with Qwen Image
